Name: Genever Collins
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice & strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.
Review: The Tom Collins was originally made with genever, so this is the original Collins. However, old tom gin replaced genever on a Tom Collins, relegating genever to what has become known as the Dutch or Genever Collins.
History: See the history of the Collins cocktail on our Tom Collins page.
Nutrition: One serving of Genever Collins contains 148 calories
